dct_title_s: Township map of Hainan with 2000 Census short form data
dct_description_sm: Township locations in Hainan Province, China, with 2000 Census data from short form tables A1-A8 (100% counts). Includes general information, age composition, households, deaths, household registration, and housing.
dct_creator_sm: All China Marketing Research Co., Ltd.
